title: Mindy Kaling determines her ideal match on Ellen
title_page: Mindy Kaling determines her ideal match on Ellen | Daily Mail Online
text:
She's one of the most successful comediennes in Hollywood.
But somehow Mindy Kaling is still single, which prompted Ellen to try and help the Ocean's Eight actress find love on her Wednesday afternoon show.
Ellen started the process by introducing 37-year-old Mindy as 'very single,' before explaining that the Office star would be presented with two options from which to choose and 'narrow down' the possible list of future lovers.
Lucky her! somehow Mindy Kaling is still single, which prompted Ellen to try and help the Ocean's Eight actress find love on her Wednesday afternoon show
The first two gentlemen on offer were rapper Drake, 30, and actor Jake Gyllenhaal, 36.
After Ellen reminded her audience that 'it's her date, not yours,' after her ebullient viewers attempted to influence Mindy's decision, the actress finally stated 'I have to go with Drake,' which drew uproarious applause.
Next up, Bradley Cooper, 42, was pitted against the Fake Love singer, which prompted Mindy to gush over The Hangover star's famous blue eyes before indeed picking the Hollywood heartthrob.
Hugh Grant, 56, was then put up against Cooper, but only managed to draw a negative, 'visceral' reaction from the audience, which no doubt helped quickly disqualify him.

Creed star Michael B. Jordan, 30, was up next, which elicited the comment 'he's younger than me,' from Mindy, a fact which apparently sealed the deal.
Superstar Brad Pitt, 53, was then projected on screen, though it was quickly pointed out that 'the ex is really pretty,' of course referring to Angelina Jolie.
'She drops off [the kids] in sweats, I'm in an Oscar gown, we can't compete,' claimed Mindy, before dismissing the Academy Award winner.

Clint Eastwood's son Scott Eastwood, 30, was then quickly rejected, before the famously eccentric Jared Leto, was proposed.
The Suicide Squad star was quickly shot down over concerns from Mindy that he's 'a little too unconventional for me,' with Ellen piling on 'yes, he's sometimes in pajamas.'
Finally, after asking if there are 'any men left in the world,' the Inside Out star was presented with Lion's hunky Dev Patel, 26, which immediately got Mindy's vote of approval.
